page.title: 08 B.B. 2
page.content:
B.B. has just recently recovered from a long illness. He now resides with his brother in Sudborough.
In the school library at Prince William School, Oundle, there are about 10,000 books, some of which were written by our local author. The titles include : { Brendon Chase (1944) { Down the Bright Stream (1948) { Little Grey Men (1942) { Lord of the Forest (1975) { A summer on the Nene (1967) { Wild Love}- the story of the Pytchley Fox{(1939)
{ Little Grey Men}won the Carnegie Medal in 1942. It is the story of the last gnomes in England - Dodder, Baldmoney, Cloudberry and Sneezewart.
